text: Myrtle Devenish (29 July 1912 – 21 January 2007) was a British film actress. She appeared in Terry Gilliam's 1985 cult film Brazil.imdb entry Devenish was born in Ebbw Vale, Wales, UK. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 1976 Mr Smith Anon 1981 Time Bandits Beryl 1983 The Crimson Permanent Assurance Tea Lady 1983 Runners The Hotel - Lady on Telephone 1985 Brazil Typist in Jack's Office 1986 L'étincelle Grany 1988 The Hound of the Baskervilles Postmistress ==References== ==Other websites== * * Entry on aveleyman website Category:Welsh movie actors Category:1913 births Category:2007 deaths
title: Myrtle Devenish
